name: TAMU Human Resources
description:
We serve as the first point of contact for employees and HR Liaison Network members regarding human resources issues for the following:

  • Benefit Services
  • Classification and Compensation
  • Employee Assistance Program
  • Employee & Organizational Development
  • Employee Relations
  • Policy & Practice Review
  • Recognition
  • Recruitment & Workforce Planning
  • Work Life Programs

HR Mission

We provide human resource programs, services and expertise that foster employee and organizational success.

HR Vision

Be the source of human resources expertise.

HR Core Values

Integrity:
We demonstrate uncompromising commitment to honesty and accountability.
Respect:
We treat all people with dignity, recognizing diversity and unique experiences, perspectives and contributions.
Quality:
We strive for excellence in meeting our customers' expectations.
Expertise:
We develop and apply the highest level of knowledge and skills to address our customers' needs.

More About HR

  • HR Organizational Chart
  • HR Strategic Partners
  • HR Recognition & Awards
  • HR Customer Service Principles
  • HR Employee Communications

If you have questions or comments about what we do or how we might do it better, please contact us.
summary: Human Resources provides human resource programs, services and expertise that foster employee and organizational success at Texas A&M University.

organizationType.name: University Finance / Administration Entity - NOT part of DSA
